detailsData.title: Experienced Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: With over 40 years of collective experience, our trial lawyers have successfully litigated over 90 trials.

detailsData.title: Community Involvement
detailsData.content: Actively involved in volunteer projects to help local communities provide a better future.

detailsData.title: Free Initial Evaluation
detailsData.content: Every new client gets a free initial case evaluation to discuss their legal needs.

address: 3500 W. Olive Ave., Suite 300, Burbank, CA 91505
companyName: Law Offices of Michael C. Murphy
subHeading: A Business Approach to Legal Issues
valueProp: The Law Offices of Michael C. Murphy is a specialized boutique law firm located in the heart of Westlake Village, CA. Our firm is equipped with aggressive trial lawyers who have been collectively practicing for over 40 years.

testimonalData.text: Highly ethical, highly experienced and will go to bat for you! So, if you've ever been in a situation where you really needed a lawyer, then you know what I'm talking about.
testimonalData.author: Satisfied Client

testimonalData.text: Best decision I made after an accident was to hire the Law Offices of Michael Murphy. On our first meeting they explained what the process would be and it turned out to be exactly what happened.
testimonalData.author: Another Satisfied Client

testimonalData.text: I could not have attained better legal representation than what I received from the 'Murphy Team'. Their dedication, integrity and overall perseverance put forth on my behalf was nothing short of exceptional.
testimonalData.author: Grateful Client
